title: The V8 Finale (2012 Season)
description:
Often hailed as one of the greatest seasons in F1 history:

• Seven different winners in the first seven races created unprecedented unpredictability
• Vettel's third title came down to a dramatic finale in Brazil, winning by just 3 points over Alonso
• Rule changes and faster-degrading Pirelli tyres closed the performance gap between teams
• Six World Champions racing simultaneously (Vettel, Alonso, Button, Hamilton, Räikkönen, Schumacher)
• Schumacher's final season and Räikkönen's successful comeback with Lotus
• Return of the US Grand Prix at the new Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas

Experience this legendary season using Formula Reiza (V8 KERS/DRS). Tracks adapted where official ones are unavailable.
